Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located on Main retail corridor at the signalized intersection (SEC of S Colorado St. and E. Lincoln Hwy). Opportunities for a drive-thru, small shop retail and/or self-storage.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Existing tenant, Big Lots, has expanded to open their newer "Store of The Future" format. Half mile East of Southlake Mall. Over 40,7000 VPD. Premier pylon signage opportunity.
